title: Worked Solution
text:
The color of light emitted is determined by its wavelength. The wavelength of the photon emitted, as calculated, is $$	extbf{699.93 nm}$$. In the visible spectrum:
-Violet light ranges from about 380 to 450 nm,
-Blue light from 450 to 495 nm,
-Green light from 495 to 570 nm,
-Yellow light from 570 to 590 nm,
-Orange light from 590 to 620 nm,
-$$	extbf{Red light ranges from 620 to 750 nm}$$.
Since the wavelength 699.93 nm falls within the range for red light, the photon emitted corresponds to $$	extbf{red light}$$.
